attributes.action: front line staff pay increase and implement correct support /counselling
attributes.additional_details: Parliament /government are the only ones that have the power to pass this recognition off
attributes.background: Recognise the nhs staff with for their efforts throughout this covid-19 crisis. They work tirelessly around the clock. The nhs staff are holding people’s hands whilst they die without any family around them. My sister in law is a nurse and she is on the phone to my partner in tears after every shift

rejection.details:
We've published these petitions calling for similar actions:

Fund after care for all NHS staff following coronavirus:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313439

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
